common_failedLoadingItemPrices.message: Failed loading item prices. Please try again later.

extensionDescription.description: A short description of the extension, intended for display in the browser's user interface. In Firefox and Chrome this value can be up to 132 characters.
extensionDescription.message: Enhance your online trading experience on Skinport and Steam with Skinport Plus.

extensionName.description: Name of the extension. This is used to identify the extension in the browser's user interface and on sites like addons.mozilla.org. Chrome and Edge restrict the name length to 45 characters.

options_permissionsRequired_description_.message: Skinport Plus requires permissions in order to work and fully secure your trading experience.
Protecting your privacy is very important to us, therefore Skinport Plus doesn't and will never collect any personal information or read your browser activity.

options_steamCommunityAccountCheckSecuri.message: This feature detects exposed Steam Web API Keys on your account, a common target in phishing attacks to control your account and steal inventories.
Check for Steam account security vulnerabilities

options_steamCommunityTradeOffersShowIte.message: Show suggested item prices from Skinport on each item.

options_steamCommunityTradeOffersShowTot.message: Show total trade values based on suggested item prices from Skinport.

options_steamCommunityTradeOffersVerifyT.message: This feature checks if a trade partner on Steam is an official Skinport bot to confirm its authenticity.

phishingBlocker_description_paragraph1.message: Skinport extension has blocked access to {{blockedHost}}, because it potentially pretends to be Skinport and may trick you into doing something dangerous like revealing your Steam information such as email, password and Steam Web API key.

phishingBlocker_description_paragraph2.message: Please make sure to only visit our official website <skinportLink>skinport.com</skinportLink>

phishingBlocker_visitPotentiallyUnsafeSi.message: If you understand the risks to your security, visit this <potentiallyUnsafeSiteLink>potentially unsafe site</potentiallyUnsafeSiteLink>.

steamcommunity_accountSecurityCheck_bann.message: Security vulnerabilities detected on your Steam account

steamcommunity_accountSecurityCheck_dial.message: Using your API key on trading websites is unnecessary and poses significant risks. Intended primarily for developers, misuse of your API key is akin to exposing your login credentials. Such actions can lead to phishing attacks and might result in your Steam account being compromised or banned, in violation of the <0>Steam Web API Terms of Use</0>.
What is a Steam Web API Key?

A Steam Web API Key has been detected on your account. This key could be exploited by malicious actors to control your account and inventory, including accepting or declining trade offers. Such keys are frequently used in phishing attacks to steal inventory.
If you have not registered a Steam Web API Key yourself, please deauthorize all devices immediately as a precaution.
Next, ensure to revoke the Steam Web API Key.

Additionally, we recommend changing your password. If attackers have accessed your Steam Web API Key, they might also know your Steam password. If this password is used elsewhere, it is crucial to change it on other sites too.

steamcommunity_profileVerified_verifiedS.message: This is a verified Skinport bot

steamcommunity_traderOfferCheck_error_de.message: Something went wrong while verifying the trade partner. Please try again later or continue with caution.

steamcommunity_traderOfferCheck_tradePar.message: This trade offer does not appear to be from Skinport, and we couldn't verify the trade partner.
We advise you to only continue if you trust the trade partner. You will not be able to get your items back.
Could someone be attempting to scam you?
This trade offer is officially from Skinport, and the trade partner is a verified Skinport bot.
